The Rambo Shoes is keenly crafted for the running enthusiasts, featuring mesh upper that enhances moisture control and gives airy comfort to the foot. The combination of EVA with rubber pod in the sole offers exceptional traction in all types of terrain. The low boot structure and the knitted mesh upper offers the versatility to be styled perfectly for a casual or sporty outfit. The EVA midsole offers cushioning with rebound to boost the performance with every pace in the track. This low boot silhouettes is enticing turn the heads around on street.EVA midsole for lightness
Rubber outsole for traction

Here's a running shoe that has features you won't find in too many other shoes in this space. With its ProFoam midsole it is extremely lightweight and responsive. And that's exactly what you need on your next run. This cushioning combines with solid outsole biomechanics, including a decoupled heel, that delivers the high-end performance you demand.ProFoam: PUMA's lightweight, high-rebound EVA midsole solution provides instant cushioning and a responsive ride

Based on PUMA’s innovative Running System technology, the RS-X line draws its design inspiration from the decade that had the best toys ever, hands down, bar none: the 1980s. Specifically, these kicks play on the trend of the toys of our childhood ultimately becoming collector’s items down the road. The mesh upper on these shoes promote air flow, and features colours that would be at home in a crowded video arcade from 30 years ago. A unique cushioning function provides support, and the rubber outsole offers supreme traction and grip.

Keep the game going in the shoe that launched a movement, our Future Rider Play On Unisex Sneakers. This shoe is dedicated to pared-down performance, featuring a super-light nylon, suede and leather upper and our famous shock-absorbing Federbein outsole to keep you pounding the pavement in style.Heel type: Flat
Shoe width: Regular fit
Shoe pronation: Neutral

Invest in our planet in our RS-Z RE.GEN Sneakers, our newest and most sustainable addition to our iconic RS family. This forward-thinking update is inspired by the idea of regenerating our planet and utilises all non-virgin materials for a fully recycled shoe that is anything but old hat. It shines with pops of bright colour and a soft, supportive stride that will carry you into the future in comfort and style.Running System: PUMA's comfortable cushioning technology celebrates the reinvention of a unique moment and movement in culture
PU midsole: PUMA's Polyurethane midsole assists a smooth foot stride for comfortable wear and a futuristic look
RE.GEN: The RE.GEN collection is inspired by the idea of regeneration. In an effort to reduce industry waste and repair our changing world, we've used non-virgin materials.
Contains Recycled Material: Made with recycled fibers. One of PUMA's answers to reduce our environmental impact.
Recycled nylon and mesh upper
PU midsole

Trinomic brought about a sneaker revolution in the ‘90s. Now it’s back. Its three fundamental staples – cushioning, flexibility, and stability – remain, as well as the instantly recognisable triangle logo. The Neutron Running shoes is merged with ultimate performance feature and elevated design elements. The fully mesh upper offers moisture repellence for long hours for your limitless running trails. The Dwane Men's Running Shoe is mindfully created to cater to the running enthusiasts featuring mesh upper that enhances moisture control and gives airy comfort to the foot. The mesh upper also makes the shoe suitable for long running hours. The combination of EVA with rubber pod in the outsole offers exceptional traction in all types of terrain. The low boot structure and the knitted mesh upper offers the versatility to be styled perfectly for a casual or sporty outfit. The Dwane is uniquely designed with EVA midsole for cushioning and lightness. The cushioning also offers rebound to boost the performance with every pace in the track.The variety of colours and the PUMA branding, especially the PUMA footstrip makes it an enticing runner shoe.Heel type: Flat
